video1.title: Top 5 Plays of the Night (ASL) | June 1, 2023
video1.description: Check out top plays from Game 1 of the NBA Finals with analysis that is interpreted into American Sign Language! The Nuggets lead this best-of-seven series, 1-0, with Game 2 taking place on Sunday, June 4
